name: Something is in the Party
description:
Something is in the Party is rythmic shoot 'em up game made for the 2020 Mix and Game Jam.

The theme of the jam was "Mix Two Genres" and the genres we decided to mix were : Rythm Game and Shoot 'Em Up

In the game you are stuck in a nightclub and have to fight waves of enemies while attacking to the beat of the music.

Credits:

Wiloux (https://wiloux.itch.io/) - Programmer & Manager

Outfoxeed (Morigan, https://outfoxeed.itch.io/) - Programmer

Miguel Inês (SoundCloud: https://soundcloud.com/miguelines, Itch.io: https://itch.io/profile/miguelmusic) - Music & SFX

S Group (https://s-group.itch.io/) - Game Designer

kindly_alligator(https://www.instagram.com/kindly_alligator/?hl=en) - Artist
